## DefaultEnvAdapterOptions.onCursorLeave property

Cursor leave event handler. like [mouseleave](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseleave_event)<!-- -->.

```typescript
onCursorLeave?: (el: THREE.Object3D) => void;
```
